title: Episode 206: Soup Season
description:
Soup can be tricky to make at home. It often doesn’t turn out quite as rich and flavorful and dynamic as you want, especially if you’re not working with homemade stock. This week we give some tips and techniques (and recipes!) that will help convince you you can, indeed, do it.
Get the recipes from this episode:
Creamy Tomato Soup with Cheese Toasties
Beef and Bacon Stew
Quite Possibly the Best Chickpeas
Chicken and Rice Soup with Garlicky Chile OilKale Minestrone with Pistou
Vegan Butternut Squash Soup
Chile Crisp
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
